featured.text: With a continuous 3 km stretch of golden sand, the beach attracts artists around the world each summer to create amazing _____ with its fine soft sand.
Continuous as the stars that shine And twinkle on the Milky Way, They stretched in never-ending line Along the margin of a bay:

definition.en_def: Forming an unbroken whole; without interruption.
definition.example: The continuous sound of the waves was soothing.
